experience.title: Chief Operations and Marketing Officer
experience.description: ● Initiated the digitalization of patient journey by management softwares leading to improvement in operational efficiency by 30%●Built and deployed a queuing management app for the patient to reduce the waiting time and increase patient satisfaction.● Drove marketing campaigns through various online and offline channels witnessing MoM growth of new patient by 23%● Trained 28 full time employees to follow protocols ensuring best care to patients resulting securing the (NABH) certification● Successfully conducted 3 eye checkup camps in underprivileged regions, drawing approximately 1000 attendees.● Initiated a new charitable hospital with comprehensive facilities to provide accessible healthcare for the underserved population.
experience.description_html: ● Initiated the digitalization of patient journey by management softwares leading to improvement in operational efficiency by 30%●Built and deployed a queuing management app for the patient to reduce the waiting time and increase patient satisfaction.● Drove marketing campaigns through various online and offline channels witnessing MoM growth of new patient by 23%● Trained 28 full time employees to follow protocols ensuring best care to patients resulting securing the (NABH) certification● Successfully conducted 3 eye checkup camps in underprivileged regions, drawing approximately 1000 attendees.● Initiated a new charitable hospital with comprehensive facilities to provide accessible healthcare for the underserved population.

experience.title: Supply Chain Intern
experience.description: Worked for a bitumen supply chain company operating a fleet of 50 trucks.Spearheaded initiatives to optimize and improve logistics and inventory management.Redefined demand forecasting models to optimize routes for the fleet, resulting in a 25% reduction in stock outs.Analyzed vehicle performance data, fuel consumption patterns, and maintenance schedules, resulting in a 12% reduction in operational expenses.Implemented JIT principles, leading to a 10% decrease in carrying costs while maintaining consistent supply levels.

experience.title: Cloud Engineer
experience.description: Collaborated with a client to implement auto-scaling solutions for their application, ensuring seamless performance for large user bases.
